biotools.summary: Gene Ontology Enrichment Analysis (GOEAST) is a toolkit for the identification of over-represented GO terms in a given gene set. Distinguishing features include: capacity to analyze data from various sources and from multiple species, and the capacity to cross compare GO enriched terms across experiments to identify correlations.

bioschemas.name: GOEAST
